channel.title: Ipod touch wifi?
channel.description:
well my ipod touch wifi has a problem when it says it has frequency signals it still doest not work even when there is 3 curved lines lying on top of each other :D. and then when i hit a wifi connection that is locked it connects without me entering the password (on connections i attempted to use before). <- this happens when i have ask to join on and off.
This is very bad i do not know why this is happening it use to work great the ipod touch is the greatest invention ever, i have a 1g nigga ass ipod touch that is jailbroken BTW. :cool:

item.title: Ipod touch wifi?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

[quote=“nohope, post:11, topic:311791”][quote author=Eh Pretty Easy link=topic=408225.msg3015035#msg3015035 date=1257111657]

[quote author=nohope link=topic=408225.msg3015031#msg3015031 date=1257111418]
will that delete everything
[/quote]YES IT WILL DELETE EVERYTHING BUT UNLESS YOU WANT TO FIX THIS ISSUE AND SEE WHETHER IT CAN BE FIXED THIS WAY, THEN YOU HAVE TO DO IT!
[/quote]ur such a card[/quote]My such a card? Sorry I didn’t understand. [quote=“eczema3, post:10, topic:311791”]If you sync your ipod first, (Normally does it automatically when you plug it in) you will loose I think all your music & videos, but keep all your settings.[/quote]Yeah he could do that, too. When I first got my ipod I did that thinking that all the music and videos will stay untouched. Unfortunately, that wasn’t the case and I lost everything But anyways, nohope, I doubt you have that much on your ipod that you couldn’t replace it in ~1 day or so.

Read full topic

item.title: Ipod touch wifi?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

[quote=“eczema3, post:3, topic:311791”]unjailbreak it, sell it on ebay for $50, buy a new 32gb one for $200 from apple store, use blackra1n to jailbreak it then try again ??[/quote]And what would the fucking point in that be? Losing more money? Idiot.

I read about this problem a long time ago when people were jailbreaking using the tiff exploit. You should try restoring it using itunes and see whether the problem is fixed.

Read full topic
